name: Project 1: TrustLens
details:
TrustLens is a website that focuses on building trust and transparency. It features a 'Meet Our Partners' section to showcase key collaborators and their contributions. 
- Functionality: Partner showcase, smooth navigation, responsive design. 
- Tools Used: React.js, TailwindCSS, daisyUI, React Icons, Firebase. 
- Hosted on: Firebase.

name: Project 2: MovFlicks
details:
MovFlicks is a dynamic movie platform that allows users to search and explore movies. 
- Functionality: Search bar, movie details page, dynamic API integration. 
- Tools Used: React.js, TailwindCSS, Axios, Firebase for hosting. 
- API: Integrated The Movie Database (TMDb) API for movie data.

name: Project 3: Adventurous
details:
Adventurous is a platform designed for eco-adventure enthusiasts. 
- Functionality: Adventure listings, search filters, booking system. 
- Tools Used: React.js, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB for database management. 
- Hosted on: Firebase.
